about_the_game:
Retro Book

This Retro Book brings 20 new images to Coloring Pixels, each image depicts items or icons that represent the old-school cool retro history!

A look into the cool, vintage, not-so-long-ago, past!

Contents

The Retro book unlocks the following images:

  • Personal Computer - 52x52
  • Printer Camera - 53x77
  • Floppy Disk - 57x57
  • Miami - 58x58
  • Aliens - 66-90
  • Home Gaming - 72x61
  • Rotary Phone - 85x45
  • Analogue Radio - 92x80
  • Pinball - 99x171
  • Vintage TV - 100x100
  • Diner - 150x99
  • Arcade Games - 160x230
  • Disco - 179x240
  • Cassette Player - 196x187
  • 80's Sports Car - 200x100
  • Arcade Retrowave - 230x140
  • The Space Race - 295x200
  • The Space Race 2 - 295x200
  • Desktop - 295x205
  • Synthwave - 360x300

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

name: Coloring Pixels - Retro Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
